title: Is Hunter Biden using the N-Word Racist?
description:
You won’t BELIEVE what Hunter Biden’s text messages say. Okay, maybe you will, since racism runs in the family. We also take a deep dive into Canada’s new government censorship law. And a New York Times reporter is “disturbed” by seeing the American flag. Guess what she can do with herself ... #HunterBiden #RacistHunter #Jan6
